articles.title: #Drosten
articles.description: Topic model evalution of reactions to scientific communication
articles.contents:
Why is this important
Research Questions
The research questions that shall be answered are:
Can we discover patterns in reactions to communication of scientific experts using Latent Diriclet Allocation?
Is it possible to detect temporal trends in twitter data reactions to science communication of Christian Drosten using topics generated from a topic modeling algorithm?
Using topic modeling, can one detect diachronic changes within the words of a given topic throughout the entire corpus?
Can one use topic modeling to detect diachronic changes in term/word usage within documents that fall into a specific topic?
method: topic modeling
